David Hathorn (amụrụ 21 Mee 1962) bụ onye ọchụnta ego dabere na South Africa na onye isi otu Mondi Group.
Hathorn gụrụ akwụkwọ na Hilton College na Mahadum Natal, ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ nke azụmahịa
Ọ bụ onye nyocha Chartered na Chartered Financial Analyst tozuru oke
Hathorn jere ozi na Deloitte & Touche na Johannesburg na 1987.   Ọ sonyeere Anglo American na 1989 dị ka onye njikwa ego ngalaba na ngalaba ụlọ ọrụ & International Finance
Na 1991 ọ kwagara Mondi ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ego na mgbe ahụ onye isi njikwa Mondi Europe
N'afọ 2000, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ ọkwa onye isi nke Mondi Group ugbu a.
